title: Hour 3 - Lance Zierlein (03-24-20)

description:
Dan and The Danettes welcome NFL.com writer Lance Zierlein. Thank you to today's sponsors: Geico = Visit Geico.com. In just 15 minutes you could save 15% or more on car insurance.   Sleepnumber = Experience the best sleep of your life, visit sleepnumber.com/patrick.  ZipRecruiter = The smartest way to hire.
